entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story, a student at Hogwarts. He is instructed by Dumbledore to put on his Invisibility Cloak.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A wise and powerful wizard who is one of Harry's mentors. He mounts a broom and flies towards the castle with Harry.

entities.name: madam rosmerta
entities.description: The owner of a pub near Hogwarts. She is seen tottering back to her pub as Harry and Dumbledore fly away.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: One of Harry's friends at Hogwarts.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: One of Harry's friends at Hogwarts.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The book series in which the story is set.

entities.name: invisibility cloak
entities.description: An object that allows Harry to become invisible. It is instructed by Dumbledore for Harry to put it on.

relationships.description: Harry and Dumbledore fly towards the castle together.
